info.name: Photo Frame
info.summary: Turn any screen with a browser into a neat photo frame
info.description:
Photo Frame lets you generate photo frame URL's for your albums which can then be viewed on any screen with a browser.
The possiblities are endless: - Use kiosk browsers (like Fully Kiosk Browser) to turn any android device into a photo frame - Use collaborative photo albums to co-create and share photo frame content across house hold
